page.title: 09WOMEN
page.content: A HOUSEWIFE The{housewife}interviewed has lived in the area for 16 years.She has not seen any real changes in the area.She likes the{peace and quiet}of the area and the rural atmosphere.The area is {ideal for shopping}for groceries in Bookham and Leatherhead. A DISTRICT NURSE {District nursing}consists of visiting people in their homes to do injections,dressings,general care and social visits.She does the job because she likes helping people and it gives her job satisfaction.It also brings in some extra money.Many old people need looking after.To be a district nurse you have to be a state registered nurse.
